name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 15, the Hangzhou Tianyue Four Seasons City Plot 5 development project owed workers wages, and workers jumped off a building to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 15, a woman posted a video saying that her mother was detained in a black prison in Tuanjie Village, Wanzai County, Yichun, Jiangxi Province for four days, and that she was only provided with leftovers from the guards.
A subsequent video showed that when she called a taxi to try to rescue her mother, a group of unidentified people blocked the road, forced the taxi driver out of the car, and prevented her mother from leaving.
The woman did not reveal why her mother was detained.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Bitter Winter, an Italy-based magazine sponsored by the Center for the Study of New Religions, has published a long special report on the suicide incident at Beijing University of Chinese Medicine…

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens roughly counted how many directions President Xi Jinping has pointed out in recent years.
The content is from Xinhuanet and People's Daily.
November 12, 2015: Pointing out the direction for the future development of the stock market
March 6, 2016: Pointing out the direction for the private economy
April 19, 2016: Pointing out the direction for handling netizens' messages
April 22, 2016: Pointing out the direction for the future development of China's Internet
May 25, 2016...

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 15, the 13th China Hangzhou Problem Car Show was underway in Hangzhou, Zhejiang. A large number of car company staff intercepted problem cars from entering the venue, secretly photographed the license plates of the owners, checked the relevant owner information online, and set up groups face to face to "stalk" at various entrances. A netizen revealed that "I used to work in a 4S store. Every year on March 15, the after-sales station manager would take people to guard outside the TV station's live broadcast venue. As long as they saw a car of this brand going in, the owner was the boss and he was the grandson, and he would agree to anything. But as soon as the event was over, you guessed that the owner was no longer the boss."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 16, a college of Beijing University of Chemical Technology issued a notice: fresh graduates who have signed a tripartite agreement and want to terminate the contract need to submit a 5,000-word personal job search report.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 12, a student at Nanjing Foreign Language School was criticized for taking the elevator and copying the elevator card. This caused students to complain on social platforms.
It is reported that the elevators at Nanjing Foreign Language School have always been only for teachers, and students can only take the stairs. This is not the first time that a student has been criticized for taking the elevator.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 14, Tianjin. A boy hit a delivery boy while crossing the road and fell down. Then his parents went up to him and punched and kicked him.
On the 15th, the local police issued a notice: mediation will be handled according to the willingness of both parties to reconcile.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 14, in Shijiazhuang, Hebei, a black car with the "official vehicle" logo collided with the car behind it due to multiple forced lane changes. On the 15th, the Chang'an District Traffic Police Team responded to reporters that they had intervened in the investigation and transferred the case to the accident department for handling. The Shijiazhuang Municipal Government Affairs Management Bureau said that it would report the matter and if the situation was true, the relevant responsible persons would be dealt with in accordance with the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 15, in the comment section of a 315 Gala live broadcast, netizens kept spamming the word "property"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of March 15, in Dalian, Liaoning, a drunk driving man hit a mother and her two children walking on the roadside and then fled the scene. He was later arrested on the spot. The accident caused the death of the mother and a child.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 16, the Dalian Public Security Bureau Economic Development Zone Branch issued a police report

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 16, Chaozhou, Guangdong. The Hu'an Yujing project has been suspended for more than a year, and there is still no sign of resumption. The owners came to the developer to defend their rights and demanded a refund.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 16, an explosion occurred in a barbecue restaurant in Xiangyu Community, Huai'an, Jiangsu.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of March 16, a forest fire broke out in the Yajiang direction of the Jianziwan Mountain section of National Highway 318 in Ganzi, Sichuan. The Tagong grassland blocked out the sun, and the fire was less than 20 kilometers away from Yajiang County.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens searched for relatives in the comment section

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/q5UKxogHSV

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 16, Huakang Insurance Company in Yangxin County, Binzhou City, Shandong Province, collapsed, and all the money in the company's major outlets could not be withdrawn. A large number of citizens gathered outside the outlets to defend their rights. According to local residents, the amount involved was as high as hundreds of millions of yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/PgPL5tuPQm

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 15, Wei County, Hebei. The construction of Xiangti Blue Bay has been unfinished for more than 10 years, and the owners knelt down to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Cangzhou, Hebei, a large number of workers gathered outside the gate of Cangxing Holding Co., Ltd. and held up banners to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/SrblmzvhVl

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A Weibo post on September 7, 2022 shows that Tik Tok is listed on the "Mobile APP Blacklist" warning sign published by the People's Armed Forces Department of Xiangcheng City, Zhoukou, Henan Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Photographer was followed and threatened by scenic spot staff after helping tourists take photos. After the video was released, the police knocked on the door in the middle of the night
March 15 (released), Kunming, Yunnan. A photographer posted a video saying that when she was strolling on the Kunming Haigeng Dam, a tourist asked her to help take a photo because he disliked the low level of the paid photographers in the scenic spot. Then she was followed and harassed by two men. The two men said that this place belongs to the company and outsiders cannot come to take commercial photos. "If you think it's inappropriate, call 12345. 110 is too small and can't control (us)"
In the early morning of March 16, the police knocked on the door of the hotel room where she lived and asked her to delete the video, but the photographer firmly stated that she would not delete the video

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 16, the Kyiv Institute of Qilu University of Technology held a promotion meeting for the government-funded study abroad program in Russia.
It is reported that the Kyiv Institute of Qilu University of Technology was established in May 2019 in cooperation with the Kyiv National University of Technology and Design in Ukraine. It is the first Sino-foreign cooperative school between China and Ukraine.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The woman under house arrest in the video is named Yan Cihua. In 2020, she went to Beijing to petition because her house was forcibly demolished by the government, and knelt in Tiananmen Square. She was detained for 10 days by the Wanzai County police for disturbing public order.
